Room.Name: Uland Way/Rum Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Uland Way and Rum Road.
Room.LongDescription: Rum Road is the major north-south road on the island, but Uland Way is by far an older road. Some place through the jungle of this tropical paradise is the old Uland Mansion, built by the most famous pirate ever to sail the Respitial Sea. Some say that Uland Way was the carriage road to the house.
